channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Blocked drain and muddy water coming onto road by bridge on Albert Road, 20th February
item.description:
Near to bridge on Albert Road and Lakeside properties the drain is blocked with mud. This seems to happen every 3 to 6 months after it's been unblocked. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albert Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The temporary traffic lights have been left on Mill Lane, Brockworth despite the roadworks being finished. As it is near the sports clubs this will create havoc over the weekend Please can you arrange for them to be removed urgently Thank you, 20th February
item.description:
Good afternoon The temporary traffic lights have been left on Mill Lane, Brockworth despite the roadworks being finished. As it is near the sports clubs this will create havoc over the weekend Please can you arrange for them to be removed urgently Thank you Jill Jill Durnell Chair of Perrybrook Residents Association
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mill Lane, Brockworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Tree branch obstructing highway, 20th February
item.description:
Birdlip Hill Approximately 200 metres below the junction by the George pub. A tree branch as fallen and completely blocking the downhill carriageway.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Way, Tewkesbury

item.title: Deep pothole left lane Stoke Orchard Road just after exit of roundabout, 20th February
item.description:
Deep and wide pothole left-hand lane on Stoke Orchard Road just after exit from roundabout, before Lyndley Chase. It is part of a broken repair on road following maintenance by a utility company. I can't take photo as the road is too busy.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Orchard Road, Bishop's Cleeve

item.title: 3 potholes left after the road was partly closed 2 weeks ago for repairs to the drainage. Such a waste of money and resources to fix one problem and leave potholes un-repaired., 20th February
item.description:
1 deep, smaller hole outside 165 Hewlett rd and 2 larger, shallower ones outside 163. Cars going over these shake the whole house and cause internal damage. These holes have been poorly patched in the past, but always reopen. The deepest one has exposed roadstone which is breaking up and landing on tge pavement. Dangerous anywhere, but this is right outside a junior school!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 163b, Hewlett Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
